Publish.LongDescription:
This mod has a few options to configure the age that cims move from one life stage to the other. It also has options to configure their education.
## Age Settings
This setting menu allows you to configure some age settings:
* **Child School Start Age:** The age that children will start going to Elementary School. * **Child Age Limit:** The age that children will become teenagers. * **Teen Age Limit:** The age that teenagers will become adults. * **Adult Retirement Age:** The age that adults will retire and become elderly. * **Female Life Expectancy:** The average age that women are likely to die. * **Male Life Expectancy:** The average age that men are likely to die.
## Education Settings
This section has a few options to configure education:
* **Number of years in College:** The number of years that cims will stay in College. * **Number of years in University:** The number of years that cims will stay in University.
